line.comment: * 1) take 50% of factory resources from every trading station and spread that stockpile equally
* 2) eject anything into space that trading stations are never supposed to trade at all
* 3) create a global variable array which ranks all intermediate resources, sorted by general availability on trading stations.
* 4) create a global variable array which lists all wares that are below 10 million value in the entire galaxy
* redistribute factory resources across the galaxy
* just for the sake of ranking the resource's avaiilability we round the cargo down by 1000 to prevent integer overflow
* *^^^ Availability is an array of all 7 intermediate factory products, lowest index is most available, highest is least available in the galaxy
* *^^^ Red List is just those wares that the galaxy doesn't have much at all in no specific order (all below 10 million average credit value)

line.text: '// the total stock in the galaxy of all these wares is less than 10 million average credit value!'

sval.val: // the total stock in the galaxy of all these wares is less than 10 million average credit value!
1) take 50% of factory resources from every trading station and spread that stockpile equally
2) eject anything into space that trading stations are never supposed to trade at all
3) create a global variable array which ranks all intermediate resources, sorted by general availability on trading stations.
4) create a global variable array which lists all wares that are below 10 million value in the entire galaxy
redistribute factory resources across the galaxy
just for the sake of ranking the resource's avaiilability we round the cargo down by 1000 to prevent integer overflow
*^^^ Availability is an array of all 7 intermediate factory products, lowest index is most available, highest is least available in the galaxy
*^^^ Red List is just those wares that the galaxy doesn't have much at all in no specific order (all below 10 million average credit value)
